com.segment.analytics

Class Analytics.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.segment.analytics.Analytics.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Analytics

    public static class Analytics.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluent API for creating Analytics instances.

    • Method Detail

      • maxQueueSize

        public Analytics.Builder maxQueueSize(int maxQueueSize)
        Deprecated. Use queueSize(int) instead.
        Set the queue size at which the client should flush events.

      • queueSize

        public Analytics.Builder queueSize(int queueSize)
        Set the queue size at which the client should flush events. The client will automatically flush events every flushInterval seconds, or when the queue reaches queueSize, whichever occurs first.

      • flushInterval

        public Analytics.Builder flushInterval(int flushInterval)
        Set the interval (in seconds) at which the client should flush events. The client will automatically flush events every flushInterval seconds, or when the queue reaches queueSize, whichever occurs first.

      • defaultOptions

        public Analytics.Builder defaultOptions(Options defaultOptions)
        Set some default options for all calls. This options should not contain a timestamp. You won't be able to change the integrations specified in this options object.

      • tag

        public Analytics.Builder tag(java.lang.String tag)
        Set a tag for this instance. The tag is used to generate keys for caching. By default the writeKey is used, but you may want to specify an alternative one, if you want the instances to share different caches. For example, without this tag, all instances with the same writeKey, will share the same traits. By specifying a custom tag for each instance of the client, the instances will have a different traits instance.

      • logging

        public Analytics.Builder logging(boolean debuggingEnabled)
        Deprecated. Use debugging(boolean) instead.
        Set whether debugging is enabled or not.

      • debugging

        public Analytics.Builder debugging(boolean debuggingEnabled)
        Set whether debugging is enabled or not.
        Since:
        2.3

      • build

        public Analytics build()
        Create a Analytics client.
